eid_al_adha_activity_gifts_desc: Send the following gifts to participate in the event.
eid_al_adha_shared_prize_pool_desc: 1% of the gold coins consumed by sending event gifts will be included in the prize pool.
eid_al_adha_contribution_list_desc: Refers to the number of gold coins contributed by users to the prize pool.
eid_al_adha_activiy_end_tip: The activity has ended, you will get
eid_al_adha_rule_divide_equally_tip: The remaining {rate} is divided equally among all event participants.
eid_al_adha_activity_gifts_for_all_desc: You can participate in the activity with any gift
